Package io.wcm.maven.plugins.nodejs.mojo

Class AbstractNodeJsMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • io.wcm.maven.plugins.nodejs.mojo.AbstractNodeJsMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NodeJsCompilerMojo
    public abstract class AbstractNodeJsMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Common Node.js Mojo functionality.

    • Field Detail

      • nodeJsVersion

        @Parameter(property="nodejs.version",
           defaultValue="10.15.3",
           required=true)
protected java.lang.String nodeJsVersion
        Node.js version (minimum version: 6.3.0). Can be specified with or without "v" prefix.

      • npmVersion

        @Parameter(property="nodejs.npm.version")
protected java.lang.String npmVersion
        NPM version. If not set the NPM version that is bundled with Node.js is used.

      • nodeJsDirectory

        @Parameter(property="nodejs.directory",
           defaultValue="${java.io.tmpdir}/nodejs")
protected java.io.File nodeJsDirectory
        Default location where Node.js will be extracted to and run from

      • tasks

        @Parameter
protected java.util.List<? extends Task> tasks
        Tasks that should be run on Node.js execution.

        You can define different types of tasks: npmInstallTask or nodeJsTask items.

        Example 1: 

         <tasks>
   <npmInstallTask>
     <workingDirectory>${frontend.dir}</workingDirectory>
   </npmInstallTask>
   <nodeJsTask>
     <workingDirectory>${frontend.dir}</workingDirectory>
     <moduleName>grunt-cli</moduleName>
     <executableName>grunt</executableName>
     <arguments>
       <argument>build</argument>
     </arguments>
   </nodeJsTask>
 </tasks>

        Example 2: 

         <tasks>
   <npmInstallTask>
     <workingDirectory>${frontend.dir}</workingDirectory>
   </npmInstallTask>
   <nodeJsTask>
     <workingDirectory>${frontend.dir}</workingDirectory>
     <moduleName>npm</moduleName>
     <executableName>npm-cli</executableName>
     <arguments>
       <argument>run</argument>
       <argument>test</argument>
     </arguments>
   </nodeJsTask>
 </tasks>

      • stopOnError

        @Parameter(defaultValue="true")
protected boolean stopOnError
        Stop maven build if error occurs.

      • skip

        @Parameter(property="nodejs.skip")
protected boolean skip
        If set to true all Node.js plugin operations are skipped.
